name: Burning Soul
text: If you control a Level 8 or higher Synchro Monster: Add 1 card from your GY to your hand, except "Burning Soul", and if you do, immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon 1 Synchro Monster using monsters you control. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, your opponent cannot target Synchro Monsters on the field with card effects. You can only activate 1 "Burning Soul" per turn.
